title: How to write a letter of gratitude to a family member - Quora

response.answer_text: This is how I would do it;: My dear/dearest (or other terms of endearment - depending who you're writing to.) I am deeply indebted to you for …/ I am most humbled by … / I am most grateful to you for … / I am truly grateful (or any other adjective/simile) for … My concluding paragraph would be Thank you so very much for reaffirming my faith that family is everything / nothing can ever take the place the love of of family, especially in times of need. I've kept it as simple and to the point as possible.The wording would depend on, İnter alia, what your family member has done, the crisis you were facing and your relationship you enjoy with him /her.
